Reviews.Title: Worth it.
Reviews.Author: sean kolarik
Reviews.Content: It was worth the money hardly any issue but do have a few things that I had to work on but nothing that cost me any money but I can do with what I wanted it for so it was well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Dell D610 Laptop
Reviews.Author: ljfpgf
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised.  Worked right out of the box. Battery had some life and is holding a charge.  Connected to the internet and I was on my way.  Only two (2) weeks of use, but I don't anticipate any problems. Good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: arcafan1987
Reviews.Content: I was needing a laptop and purchased this one on amazon. So far I have been very pleased with the laptop. I haven't had any problems with it. I was able to connect to the internet quickly and can take the laptop anywhere. If I needed another one I would check with amazon first.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the price and EXCELLENT customer service!
Reviews.Author: CatholicHSMother
Reviews.Content: We bought this laptop for my 70 year old mother to play games and check email.She loves it!We had some technical issues, and Tampa Laptops fixed the computer for us!It was also fixed in a timely manner.We couldn't be happier, and it was under $200!Thank you,lori

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610
Reviews.Author: kginman
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the product and the service.  I was a little leery about buying a computer online, but it works great.  I needed an extra laptop and this one turned out perfect. I had a minor problem that was handled very well by their tech dept.

Reviews.Title: Bad luck :(
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I ordered this refurbished from Tampa-Laptops but couldn't use it because it came with virus's. I'm sure these are good computers because I've had a couple refurbished ones before, but I just had bad luck this time.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Dell Laptop
Reviews.Author: Theodore Gordon "Ted"
Reviews.Content: Dell Latitude D610 Laptop Wireless Computer (Refurbished)I purchased a refurbished Dell Laptop with low expectations. And I got, I believe, a much sturdier computer than I expected. I really hadn't wanted a Dell, but that was what was available at the time. I didn't give it 5 stars simply because I do not believe everything is perfect.It operates well at speed for my relatively simple needs, and is complete with OS for a very reasonable price. Even the battery has a little life in it .. it is good for about an hour.  I bought it to replace a Lenovo laptop that I have had for years, and relied upon until it had a disagreement with a glass of tea.I had no trouble downloading and installing a few reliable programs like Firefox, Thunderbird, Chrome, and Winamp. I had a little trouble with the wireless, but it was my problem, not a problem with the machine.The only problem that I foresee is with the power cable. It doesn't have a sturdy center post like others i have seen.  It looks more like a cable TV connector with that skinny little pin that bends easily if not placed precisely in the right position.

Reviews.Title: A good basic computer
Reviews.Author: Allan W
Reviews.Content: If you are going to use this computer for surfing the internet, book reports or light gaming then this is a good computer for you. I would not try to do much more than that. I ordered my refurbished D610 from Cool Running Technologies.When I received my computer the battery died and it would not charge. I sent an email through Amazon and Cool Running Technologies called me back the same day . I missed the call and they left me a message saying that they would send me out a new battery. I received the battery and I have not had any problems since. Even though I had a problem with my battery I would order again from Cool Running Technologies.They acted quickly and fixed my problem for me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent refurbished laptop!
Reviews.Author: RJ
Reviews.Content: I ordered a refurbished Dell laptop which was delivered in a timely fashion and in great condition.  This laptop was a replacement for a similar laptop that was in need of repairs.  The condition of the refurbished model rivaled that of a brand new laptop. Thus far, this refurbished laptop has performed without flaw (2 weeks of heavy use).  Excellent job, thanks for the great service!Dell Latitude D610 Laptop Wireless Computer (Refurbished)

Reviews.Title: Excellent second computer.
Reviews.Author: Theo
Reviews.Content: I needed a second laptop to use around the house, I have two desktops and a netbook.The netbook runs the less then exciting windows 7 starter edition and is slow and sluggish.I bought this machine to look up recipes on the internet, and to allow me to do basic browsing on newschannels.I did buy an additional 1 gigabyte memory module, and right now this computer is one of the fastest I have, even with a wireless connection.The vendor shipped this machine out very fast, and the computer works great.i would most certainly recommend the vendor, and the product.

Reviews.Title: GREAT COMPUTER!
Reviews.Author: charliexx
Reviews.Content: The computer was in perfect condition and worked great. No problems. This is a great company to do business with.

Reviews.Title: I love this DELL
Reviews.Author: amos j forsyth
Reviews.Content: I have bought three refurbished laptops online. I must say this is the best one I have bought. the other two had very little battery life when not plugged in. this will hold a 2 or 3 hour charge. plus it is very quiet and does not heat up. Only con is I wish it had a bigger hard drive but can't have everything I guess. Anyways, buy from this company and you will be treated right.!!

Reviews.Title: Dell D610, exchange for a Dell E6400
Reviews.Author: wendee robinson
Reviews.Content: I did not even take it out of box, due to it smallet, than I expected.  Due to my handicap, i need bigger keys and screen.Im it would have been fine, if I could see and feel better.  also, returning and replacing it was a breeze with Tampa Laptops.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Brittany E. Luna "killahb716"
Reviews.Content: I am not very tech savvy, so I wanted a PC that came with a Windows OS and little else.  The plan was to "build" it to my liking and efficiency.  This was a fantastic product to experiment with, and everything is going well so far!  As for the physical nature of the product, the screen is large enough to enjoy visual media, the images appear crisp with good color, and the sound is surprisingly great!  It's relatively light, as well.  I've been having fun making this laptop my own, and have received compliments from IT colleagues on how clutter-free it is.

Reviews.Title: basic
Reviews.Author: John A. Alden
Reviews.Content: It is the thing for a customer who just does e-mail.  I was impressed at how fast it cooks and it is easy enough for an old lady to read..

Reviews.Title: great buy !
Reviews.Author: t.c "t"
Reviews.Content: As its impossible to buy a new computer with windows XP this refurbished model available on amazon is where i went for a backup for my favorite OS.. i have  windows Vista and windows 8 on my other two computers and i can only say those are not improvements ,  they are essentially pointless in my opinion.. particularly windows 8..  this older refurb is fast , has wi-fi and i can find no fault with it at all ..  for 150.  its the best buy i have ever made for a laptop..  if you like windows XP and dont want to spend 500. go for it..  Im totally happy..

Reviews.Title: Meets our needs
Reviews.Author: Marshall Boyler
Reviews.Content: The computer totally meets our needs as it is used only about 9 days a month to present Powerpoint Presentations.  We are happy that we could meet our needs at such a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: short lived
Reviews.Author: aled
Reviews.Content: I got a refurbished computer and will never do it again. It lasted two months, then crashed. It was my kids computer and crashed while playing one of the games already loaded on the computer. It did work great for two months just didnt last.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Good customer
Reviews.Content: It came a day late, but was due to the holiday rush. Bought it for my son. He is able to operate the laptop with no problem. We loaded Microsoft Word with no problem. The wi-fi linked up with no problems.  My son is happy so have no complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: Revised Feedback
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I would like to revise my previous feedback.  Even though I did receive my order a week late, I did receive it.  AtoZ trading did more than make up for the error. They did priority mail my laptop to me and install windows on it, which I love!

Reviews.Title: Two mistakes, mine and theirs, but all better now!
Reviews.Author: Belle Pepper "Anna"
Reviews.Content: I wrote a review this morning that bashed this laptop because it didn't have a memory card.  They called my twice before noon and wanted to make it right.  They were very concerned that I didn't get the service or product that I was expecting -- and that has made me change my mind about this company-- to a very positive experience.  I never called them to make them aware that I had a problem -- therefore they didn't have a change to make corrections.  I am sorry about that--next time I will just pick up the phone instead of stewing for days.  So overall, the laptop arrived very quickly, is in great shape, does just what I want it to do and I feel that this company is supportive and respects the consumer.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Dell D610 Laptop
Reviews.Author: James Byrd, Jr.
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop refurbished and have been well pleased with it. I use it mainly to surf theinternet and check my email. I like the ability to use it to play DVDs on it, also.Highly recommend this Dell to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer!!
Reviews.Author: Steph012412
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the service Blair Tech provided! Shipping was fast! I got my laptop in a week, I would have gotten it sooner had FEDEX not made a mistake. Blair Tech provides excellent service. I had a question about my order & they responded right away. My laptop came well wrapped & was fully charged. It looks and runs like a brand new laptop! I am completely impressed. I was scared to purchase a refurbished laptop especially online & all I can say is that I am happy I did. I will be purchasing another one! Thank you Blair Tech for your wonderful service!

Reviews.Title: Refirbished laptop
Reviews.Author: Joanna
Reviews.Content: Computer seams to work great.  The battery does not last long but otherwise all th applications and systems operate fine.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 CD-RW/DVD Wireless Refurb
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Pretty good computer for my 14 year old.  However, not as fast as she would prefer for things like facebook, youtube, etc.  Pretty user friendly otherwise.

Reviews.Title: great laps
Reviews.Author: pot
Reviews.Content: I order this item and it arrived way in advance and was very pleased with the product.  I will buy another

Reviews.Title: unit  died  91 days latter
Reviews.Author: Doug Smillie Way "doug  way"
Reviews.Content: the lap top started having problems  roight away,  I unfortunately waited too long to contact them.  When they say 90 days they mean it and not one day over.  I would not buy from them again  they should have let me trade it in for another

Reviews.Title: I Now have bought Three Of these Vary Happy
Reviews.Author: Can't Believe I Bought It
Reviews.Content: I now have purchased Three of these from Tampa Laptops and have found them to be a Excellent sourse to buy from. Their service has been great.I can highly recommand them.

Reviews.Title: Computer exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: Steve Acers
Reviews.Content: I'll have to admit I was leery of purchasing a refurbished laptop on line but is destined to live in my vacation home in Mexico so it's not being used every day. The computer arrived on my door step right on time. It worked right out of the box! It looks almost new. And XP is easier for casual users than Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8! And the price is/was right! I'll be happy if this computer lives for two years. I'll be back to buy another one. Individuals who say that they can't afford a personal computer should check this out.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Laptop
Reviews.Author: Pleased Couple
Reviews.Content: It was shipped in a timely manner. The product was just as described. We had issues that was resloved in a timely and yet professioanl manner. We plan on buying 2 more laptops with this company. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I purchased 5 of these Dell 610 Latitude laptops (Refurbished) and kept one for myself. I had to exchange 1 of the 5. I love the laptops. My laptop came with Windows XP Pro installed, I didn't like it so I wiped the hard drive and installed Windows XP that I had from my last laptop. I went to Dell.Com and downloaded all the drivers it needed. It works great now. I am very happy with the laptop. I purchased 2GB of memory and a new battery on Ebay and installed them. The computer works great!!!!! Total cash spent $210.00

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Archie
Reviews.Content: The item was returned because it did not work properly.  Since it was returned I don't have anything further to review the item for.

Reviews.Title: Reliable Laptop
Reviews.Author: Daniel Roßbach
Reviews.Content: Given its age, the Laptop is still functioning as good as you could possibly hope for. There are current Linux distributions that support this model and are lightweight enough to run smoothly on it, for example Lubuntu 14.04. There is driver support for all major functionalities within Linux.

Reviews.Title: Dell Laptop refurbish
Reviews.Author: daniela m fermin
Reviews.Content: The computer look like trash very different than the description and picture, it came dirty,  full of dent,  it work OK.

Reviews.Title: never referbished
Reviews.Author: Amanda Lee
Reviews.Content: It had a virus when I got the computer and the fan makes a grinding noise. I had bring it to a computer company and they removed the virus and oiled the fan. But if it was refeebished there should of been no virus.

Reviews.Title: Broke
Reviews.Author: TrixieHollenback
Reviews.Content: It broke within 2 months no screen just black and it had nothing such as windows xp or so on. all it had was a trial on it and when the trial was up it wanted me to pay another 200 to put one on .

Reviews.Title: First computers for Grandsons
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: My daughter told me she received the computers and they appeared to be in good shape, however, since they were for my two little grandsons their father was getting it secured and ready for them.  We want to make sure it is safe for them to use.  It is their first computers and they are so excited.  I would give it a five star once I knew for sure that all was working well.  Thank you for such a great deal.

Reviews.Title: did not work properly as shipped.
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: I  drop shipped this to someone who is not thrilled with it but after he worked out the win 7 problems it came with (wrong drivers, validation issues, some pre loade programs crashed etc etc) the clever kid got it running OK.  This unit is a bit old to run win 7...  I ordered z unit that said it came with XP, and if it really did ship that way odds are it would be a better unit. I'm told the battery lasts long enough to get to the next room, and not much longer.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Erin Torok
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 dell laptops. The package shipped promptly, was packaged very nicely, and the price was right. I've tested both laptops. Even though they're refurbished models, they look brand new and work like new. I can't wait to give them to my boys at Christmas! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: MISREPRESENTED
Reviews.Author: Lazerus Calagurous "CaringPapa"
Reviews.Content: Product was misrepresented as having been refurbished.  Upon booting up the 610 for the 1st time, there were several icons on the desktop for FIREFOX, AVANT, and other post installation add-ons.  On other refurbished products I've purchased, the first 1st boot takes you to a product SETUP procedure as is done for new products........The battery was weak and would not keep me online for more than 20 minutes w/o a low-battery warning......System was wrought with viruses.  I had to call someone from the GEEK SQUAD and pay $$$ to bring the 610 to refurbished standards.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: good brewing
Reviews.Content: had a trojan on it ,put a virus scan on it now it seem ok. dont know who placed the trojan on it.

Reviews.Title: He sold me an item that is not user friendly for a not so-techie person
Reviews.Author: Sherwin
Reviews.Content: The computer is okay.  He set it up with a free Microsoft Essential anti-virus, but the seller should also before hand set up the computer ready for wireless connection.  Because I am not a techie person, I've had so much difficulty in connecting it to the wireless router.  The Netgear technical support (by phone) even charged me of $80 for a six-month (free tech support help to all my computer stuffs in my household) service for calling them to help me set it up.  Very sad fate for me of this needless spending, me, who was just trying to make both ends meet, as a working student, who works only 20 hours in a week.

Reviews.Title: Refurblished Laptop from Tampa Laptop
Reviews.Author: Eugene Lew
Reviews.Content: I purchased two laptops from Tampa Laptop.  The first one was defective, able to get a refund from Tampa.  Decidedto get another laptop from Tampa.  When starting the second computer, the first screen I get is a data on copyrights etc which stays on for a minute, then on to the Desktop.  The other problems are that the computer is a bit slow, and frequently will have another website pop up.  Other than that , I am satisfy with the computer, considering the lowprice.Any suggestions on how I can get rid the screen on Copyrights ?

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: Kaye Shepherd
Reviews.Content: This is a totally stripped down laptop.  No programs.  By the time you buy and load the programs, it will cost more than a new one.  Just too late to send it back.  Going to donate it to a school for their use.

Reviews.Title: It was not a refurbished computer as advertised.
Reviews.Author: john t. borawskie
Reviews.Content: It was not the computer that was promised online.  I has a missing harddrive and missing second battery.  It was not what I expected.  I am returning this item for return due to the above missing hard drive and battery.

Reviews.Title: Content
Reviews.Author: Gaby Roura Seda
Reviews.Content: Pretty good laptop. You definitely get what you pay for nothing spectacular but is useful for a secondary laptop or for small children.

Reviews.Title: HATE IT
Reviews.Author: Betty Gilmore
Reviews.Content: When I received it, it did not work right. I was told if I returned it they would fix it. I no sooner returned it and they sent it back. I mean very quickly and the reason why is because it was not fixed.  When I got it back there is a message that my battery is life is very low.  I haven't even been able to do anything on the thing and NOW I HAVE TO BUY A BATTERY.

Reviews.Title: Alright
Reviews.Author: Bratanya Jackson
Reviews.Content: I got this computer, and can't transfer my photos from my phone unto it....Maybe it is something I'm doing....Ordered the same for a friend, and he has no problems...both refurbished

Reviews.Title: I did good by my wife on this one!!!
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: To go to the heart of the matter, the item I was sold did everything the seller listed it to do. It looks great and works very well. Job well done. I will be making a call to them after getting burned by a bad Dell 600m I got from another amazon seller. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: Epic Fail
Reviews.Author: Latia Rowland
Reviews.Content: Had the laptop for about two weeks. Have nothing on it but some photos I only use it for work. Turned on the laptop goes to a blue screen and says error. Looked it up online they say its the adapter and how I will have to reinstall windows etc etc. I lost everything waste of money, won't start up.

Reviews.Title: computer
Reviews.Author: boss lady "annette"
Reviews.Content: this works great for me i don't do a lot but my daughter says its to slow for her though

Reviews.Title: Good Producgt
Reviews.Author: lpoland
Reviews.Content: This product works well. It does run hot so I had to buy a fan to sit under it. But with the fan... it works great and I am pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: perfect laptop with an affordable price
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: i bought two of these laptop for my grand kids birthdays and they loved them they always try to use them when the can then price is great and the laptops work perfect

Reviews.Title: the best start computer.
Reviews.Author: Ac
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for my kids and it worked well as for teaching them on how to care for a laptop!!

Reviews.Title: Dad loves it
Reviews.Author: Craig John
Reviews.Content: My father needed a simple laptop for his place and I was skeptical at first, but the price and the condition of the product exceeded all expectations. Would definitely do business with this seller again.

Reviews.Title: What I needed.
Reviews.Author: Will Greene
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed to run some older DOS programs and the price was very good.  The condition was better than expected.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: ROBIN ANDERSON
Reviews.Content: i got this laptop as a second one for my use and wow i was surprised it was like getting a brand new computer and for the price i paid 125.00 this is a steal i am very please and thankful that i got this deal it was all it stated to be and it's really fast too. for a great deal and price i recommend to all i brought a second as well for a friend that goes to school college and she is happy as well

Reviews.Title: Laptop is not working
Reviews.Author: Sonia Brookes
Reviews.Content: I received the laptop June 20, and after fully charging it, it is not working : what do I do now.?

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 Laptop CD-RW/ DVD Wireless
Reviews.Author: Willie B. Underwood
Reviews.Content: The computer exceeded my expectations.  It came loaded with applications that would have cost far more than the $143 I paid for the item.  Within minutes, it connected to my home wireless network, and I was browsing the internet.  I highly recommend Laptops on Line for anyone who wants to purchase a quality laptop computer at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price, but...
Reviews.Author: Philip Wu
Reviews.Content: Everything works fine...  only minor scratches on case cover, but battery life sucks... only 15 minutes charge so I always have to plug in the power adapter.  Delivery was quick and came undamaged.

Reviews.Title: Wireless
Reviews.Author: Cali
Reviews.Content: I was unable to use my wireless router for this computer because of the operating system. It was too old. I needed 2007 or newer.

Reviews.Title: awesome pad
Reviews.Author: Rilla C. Smith "rilla121259"
Reviews.Content: i loved the size of the mousepad and it was a good size the color was ok would like to see it in neon colors

Reviews.Title: my laptop
Reviews.Author: connie foster
Reviews.Content: I love my new laptop. It took me awhile to figure it out since I had a desktop before. The only thing I dont like about it is that it doesnt take the sd card to download pictures, but other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Kritter
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop.  Look like brand new and works just perfect.  Very pleased and happy with this computer!

Reviews.Title: For the price, very good value
Reviews.Author: Katrine Carver
Reviews.Content: I find you are really gambling with your money when you buy a used laptop.  For the money, the little flaws of a refurbished computer are worth the tradeoff if you find a good seller.  Right now, I couldn't afford to buy a new one but Dell's are notorious workhorses and can get years of  use out of them.  I have to buy a new battery and the keys stick a little, ( quite common if over 3 years old).  I use a supplemental keyboard and plug it in because I don't like the flatness of laptops anyway.The seller was helpful too and recommended some products to go with and even provided a bag!  Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great as ancillary laptop.
Reviews.Author: Dr. G. J. Banks
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly fast and efficient with all programs that include XP in their system requirements. Sturdy in build and quality components.

Reviews.Title: This was a great ordering experience, everything went purfectly.
Reviews.Author: rodney e. mckenzie
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed working with this product, it has done everything it is supposed to do, I have had no problems and it has not let me down yet.

Reviews.Title: Computer OK for it's price ( the refurbishing seller not sure....)
Reviews.Author: John Yakstas "john"
Reviews.Content: This computer lasted all of three months- ( I had another of same kind to compare to as a rule this computer is ok, but wouldn't get a refurbished) Had issues with this new/refurbished one.. was listed as a a different RAM to begin with....- not the computer's fault...but seller......had to get new battery from get go too.Seller was not the most courteous when I called with questions- spoke 2-3 times and all varied people were not very courteous..... Wouldn't recommend- lost files....had to order something else....don't cheap it.....You grt what you pay for.....

Reviews.Title: DELL LAPTOP PC
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Bryant "Tom Bryant"
Reviews.Content: BETTER THAN I EXPECTED.  IT WAS READY TO GO WHEN I GOT IT, DIDN'T HAVE TO DO A THING TO IT.  IT CAME WITH WINDOWS ALREADY INSTALLED.  THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Limited Potential
Reviews.Author: Diane "Scout Mom"
Reviews.Content: This laptop was purchased so my son could do school work. Unfortunately, it had limited potential and was outdated within the year.

Reviews.Title: hard drive issues and snail speed wifi capabilities
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I have bought refurbished laptops over my life and always got a solid laptop that lasts 1-2 years without protection. This time I figure since I don't need more than 100gb hard drive I'll save a couple extra bucks and go with 80Gb. I decide to install Kaspersky internet security (which I highly recommend you buy for any computer)  because I want it to last. Okay, protected good I think now to install Itunes, online games , and the program for my homework. None will install... Error message hardrive full. Okay delete stuff like pictures that come preloaded and things I won't use. Again error message the same one hard drive full. yes I know I'm trying to free up space. try to delete different stuff... ERROR HARD DRIVE FULL. What does that mean?Obviously this is unlikely to happen to you most refurbished laptops are great but besides that this one has other problems. Java not installed when you recieve normally not a big deal but I had that problem where I couldn't put anything besides Kaspersky. Internet is slow running, and I have superb wifi. If I can't fix and my dad can't either this is going back before I'm stuck with it.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610
Reviews.Author: Vittorio Boldrin
Reviews.Content: Just what I was looking for, affortable price for the job requested. It's the right machine in the case you need field laptop. I am very pleased with my investment

Reviews.Title: Just as descibed
Reviews.Author: B. Peck
Reviews.Content: We were very pleased at the value and ease of this product. Purchased for my 11 year old - we just plugged it in and it wa running. Connected easily to our wi-fi. We did purchase a fan/base to put under it as the bottom gets very warm. Overall, a great product for somone who just wants to surf the net.

Reviews.Title: pleased
Reviews.Author: drd
Reviews.Content: this was shipped in a well package box came in very fast time and the price was very good. The only drawback was it does not have a port to hook it up to my TV to play Netflix movies. The reason i bought it. But that was my fault for not asking. These guys do a good job and i will buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Great value for used laptop
Reviews.Author: Tami
Reviews.Content: This laptop was exactly as advertised. Everything worked great right out of the box. The only problem is the battery...it lasts less than 2 hours before requiring a re-charge. But for the money it's a good machine for the kids.

Reviews.Title: good lap top
Reviews.Author: brad
Reviews.Content: very good laptop for refurbished and less then two hundred dollars. this laptop does everything for school and work projects.

Reviews.Title: I'm loving this computer, got it 2 days after I ordered it.
Reviews.Author: M&M;'s Mom "Me"
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review on the computer I ordered. I unpacked it today, received just two days after I ordered it, plugged it in and took it for a test run. It's as good as they said it was and contained everything they said it would. I would recommend this computer and the company. Thanks! I've always had a great experience with amazon.com in ordering new and used items.

Reviews.Title: Dell 610
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Linebarger
Reviews.Content: Condition was almost like new.  I was very inpressed.  Better than I expected.  Put in my hard drive from my failed laptop and did not even have to load drivers.  I will buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Its Great
Reviews.Author: elaine  childs
Reviews.Content: The refurbished Dell I ordered isa great buy, I use it for my husband who plays cards on it and my granddaughter who us learning how to use a computer, it's perfect!!!

Reviews.Title: I guess it ok
Reviews.Author: Youthtil
Reviews.Content: Give this to my brother he said that it is ok and that it is working good no problem so far
